name: Ademir David
description: I am an outgoing, very warm, romantic man. I am looking for a serious woman for a serious relationship. I am very attentive towards my close people. I need much attention also and can not live without people I love. I am ready to give all my time, attention, love and care to my future Wife I would like to be not only your Husband I want to become your best friend. All I want in return is your tenderness and love.
